features.name: User Authentication
features.description: OAuth-based authentication via Kakao and Google providers with session management
acceptance_criteria: AC-001: Kakao OAuth login redirects and creates session on success
AC-002: Google OAuth login redirects and creates session on success
AC-003: Expired OAuth token prompts re-authentication without data loss
AC-004: Logout terminates session and redirects to landing page
AC-005: Unauthenticated access to protected routes redirects to login

features.name: Video Upload
features.description: Video file upload with validation, progress tracking, and resumable uploads
acceptance_criteria: AC-006: Valid video file (MP4/MOV/WebM, <500MB, 1-3 min) uploads with progress indicator
AC-007: Upload complete navigates to subject selection
AC-008: File over 500MB shows size error message
AC-009: Video duration outside 1-3 min shows duration error
AC-010: Unsupported format shows format error message
AC-011: Network interruption resumes upload automatically
AC-012: Cancel upload discards partial upload

scenarios: Successful video upload with valid file
Upload area shows empty state initially

features.name: Subject Selection
features.description: Select analysis subject from video thumbnails with visual confirmation
acceptance_criteria: AC-013: Thumbnail grid displays after upload completes
AC-014: Tap on person highlights with selection indicator
AC-015: Confirm selection stores bounding box for tracking
AC-016: Selection can be changed before confirmation
AC-017: Single person auto-selected with confirm option

features.name: Body Specification Input
features.description: User physical attributes form with validation and persistence
acceptance_criteria: AC-018: Height input accepts 100-250cm range
AC-019: Weight input accepts 30-200kg range
AC-020: Experience level dropdown with four options
AC-021: Stance selection between Orthodox and Southpaw
AC-022: Start Analysis enabled when all fields complete
AC-023: Invalid values show inline validation errors
AC-024: Body specs persisted and pre-filled on return

scenarios: Height below minimum shows validation error
Height above maximum shows validation error
Weight below minimum shows validation error
Weight above maximum shows validation error
Body specs pre-filled for returning user

features.name: Pose Estimation Processing
features.description: MediaPipe-based skeletal coordinate extraction with status tracking
acceptance_criteria: AC-025: Video processed with 33-joint XYZ coordinate extraction
AC-026: Selected subject tracked across frames via bounding box
AC-027: Successful pose data stored in structured JSON
AC-028: Over 20% frame failure marks analysis as failed with guidance
AC-029: Processing progress logged and retrievable via status endpoint

scenarios: Pose estimation fails with poor video quality

features.name: Stamp Generation
features.description: Automatic detection and timestamping of strikes and defensive actions
acceptance_criteria: AC-030: Strikes detected by arm velocity and trajectory patterns
AC-031: Defensive actions detected by torso and arm positioning
AC-032: Each action timestamped with frame number and confidence
AC-033: Stamps stored with type, timestamp, side, and confidence
AC-034: No actions detected proceeds with generic feedback

features.name: LLM Strategic Analysis
features.description: AI-generated coaching feedback based on pose data and stamps
acceptance_criteria: AC-035: Pose data and stamps formatted as JSON for LLM
AC-036: Derived metrics calculated (reach ratio, tilt, guard speed, frequency)
AC-037: LLM generates 3-5 strengths, weaknesses, recommendations each
AC-038: Analysis adapts to user experience level
AC-039: LLM failure retries 3 times with exponential backoff
AC-040: Analysis includes AI disclaimer

scenarios: Analysis adapts to beginner experience level
Analysis adapts to competitive experience level

features.name: Report Display
features.description: Analysis report with metrics visualization and recommendations
acceptance_criteria: AC-041: Summary section displays overall assessment
AC-042: Strengths section shows 3-5 observations
AC-043: Weaknesses section shows 3-5 improvement areas
AC-044: Recommendations section shows 3-5 actionable items
AC-045: Key moments section with timestamp links
AC-046: Metrics displayed with visual indicators
AC-047: Report page loads within 1.5 seconds
AC-048: Report responsive on mobile and desktop

scenarios: Report displays key moments with timestamps
Report displays correctly on mobile viewport
Report displays correctly on desktop viewport

features.name: Report Sharing
features.description: Share analysis reports via unique public URLs
acceptance_criteria: AC-049: Share button shows on report page (default private)
AC-050: Enable sharing generates unique URL
AC-051: Shared URL accessible without authentication
AC-052: Copy Link copies to clipboard with confirmation
AC-053: Shared report shows social preview cards
AC-054: Disabling sharing invalidates the URL
AC-055: Re-enabling generates new unique URL

scenarios: Report shows share button in private state
User enables sharing and gets unique URL
User copies share link to clipboard
User re-enables sharing gets new URL

features.name: Report History Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard listing past analysis reports with navigation and deletion
acceptance_criteria: AC-056: Dashboard lists reports sorted by date descending
AC-057: List items show thumbnail, date, summary indicator
AC-058: Clicking report navigates to full view
AC-059: Delete report shows confirmation dialog
AC-060: Empty state shows upload CTA

scenarios: Dashboard displays report list sorted by date
Report list item shows thumbnail and summary
User navigates to report from list
Dashboard shows empty state for new user
